verses.html:
1
Time now has passed; hail the new year!
Saints at Godâ€™s throne are gathered here,
Worshiping Him with thanks we sing,
Praises ascend to Christ our King.

2
Father we thank Thee for past care,
Blessing and guiding through the year.
Take now this year, show us Thy way,
Keep us from straying, Lord, we pray.

3
Father protect us from all wrong.
Thee would we serve helping the throng.
Grant us the wisdom and the power,
Thy will to do each passing hour.

4
Dear Lord, increase our faith each day,
To higher planes, lift us we pray.
We place our work within Thy hand,
Oh, give us peace! Revive again.
